Help for the Advanced folder
You can use this field to add a where clause that will be added to the where clause of the form query.
The content id is added as a fragment to the links.

The "query" property makes it possible to execute queries in "input" or "update" forms. Because any query may be executed, for security reason, only admin users can check this field must when this property is needed.
The use of the php exec function is allowed in export which makes the execution of text processors possible, for example.

This option makes it possible to store your record in a storage page, for example a "sysfolder", otherwise records are stored in the current page. When this option is used, records are fetched in the storage page and in the pages defined in the "starting point" if any.
